00020         class ITexture;
00021 
00023         enum E_BLEND_FACTOR
00024         {
00025                 EBF_ZERO        = 0,            
00026                 EBF_ONE,                        
00027                 EBF_DST_COLOR,                  
00028                 EBF_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR,        
00029                 EBF_SRC_COLOR,                  
00030                 EBF_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR,        
00031                 EBF_SRC_ALPHA,                  
00032                 EBF_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA,        
00033                 EBF_DST_ALPHA,                  
00034                 EBF_ONE_MINUS_DST_ALPHA,        
00035                 EBF_SRC_ALPHA_SATURATE          
00036         };
00037 
00039         enum E_MODULATE_FUNC
00040         {
00041                 EMFN_MODULATE_1X        = 1,
00042                 EMFN_MODULATE_2X        = 2,
00043                 EMFN_MODULATE_4X        = 4
00044         };
00045 
00047         inline f32 pack_texureBlendFunc ( const E_BLEND_FACTOR srcFact, const E_BLEND_FACTOR dstFact, const E_MODULATE_FUNC modulate )
00048         {
00049                 return (f32)(modulate << 16 | srcFact << 8 | dstFact);
00050         }
00051 
00053         inline void unpack_texureBlendFunc ( E_BLEND_FACTOR &srcFact, E_BLEND_FACTOR &dstFact,
00054                         E_MODULATE_FUNC &modulo, const f32 param )
00055         {
00056                 const u32 state = (u32)param;
00057                 modulo  = E_MODULATE_FUNC( ( state & 0x00FF0000 ) >> 16 );
00058                 srcFact = E_BLEND_FACTOR ( ( state & 0x0000FF00 ) >> 8 );
00059                 dstFact = E_BLEND_FACTOR ( ( state & 0x000000FF ) );
00060         }
00061 
00063         const u32 MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES = 4;
00064 
00066         class SMaterial
00067         {
00068         public:
00070                 SMaterial()
00071                 : MaterialType(EMT_SOLID), AmbientColor(255,255,255,255), DiffuseColor(255,255,255,255),
00072                         EmissiveColor(0,0,0,0), SpecularColor(255,255,255,255),
00073                         Shininess(0.0f), MaterialTypeParam(0.0f), MaterialTypeParam2(0.0f), Thickness(1.0f),
00074                         Wireframe(false), PointCloud(false), GouraudShading(true), Lighting(true),
00075                         ZWriteEnable(true), BackfaceCulling(true), FrontfaceCulling(false),
00076                         FogEnable(false), NormalizeNormals(false), ZBuffer(1),MatValues(NULL)
00077                 { }
00078 
00080 
00081                 SMaterial(const SMaterial& other) : MatValues(NULL)
00082                 {
00083                         // These pointers are checked during assignment
00084                         for (u32 i=0; i<MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES; ++i)
00085                                 TextureLayer[i].TextureMatrix = 0;
00086                         *this = other;
00087                 }
00088                 ~SMaterial()
00089                 {
00090                         if(MatValues)
00091                                 MatValues->drop();
00092                 }
00093 
00095 
00096                 SMaterial& operator=(const SMaterial& other)
00097                 {
00098                         // Check for self-assignment!
00099                         if (this == &other)
00100                                 return *this;
00101 
00102                         MaterialType = other.MaterialType;
00103 
00104                         AmbientColor = other.AmbientColor;
00105                         DiffuseColor = other.DiffuseColor;
00106                         EmissiveColor = other.EmissiveColor;
00107                         SpecularColor = other.SpecularColor;
00108                         Shininess = other.Shininess;
00109                         MaterialTypeParam = other.MaterialTypeParam;
00110                         MaterialTypeParam2 = other.MaterialTypeParam2;
00111                         Thickness = other.Thickness;
00112                         for (u32 i=0; i<MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES; ++i)
00113                         {
00114                                 TextureLayer[i] = other.TextureLayer[i];
00115                         }
00116 
00117                         Wireframe = other.Wireframe;
00118                         PointCloud = other.PointCloud;
00119                         GouraudShading = other.GouraudShading;
00120                         Lighting = other.Lighting;
00121                         ZWriteEnable = other.ZWriteEnable;
00122                         BackfaceCulling = other.BackfaceCulling;
00123                         FrontfaceCulling = other.FrontfaceCulling;
00124                         FogEnable = other.FogEnable;
00125                         NormalizeNormals = other.NormalizeNormals;
00126                         ZBuffer = other.ZBuffer;
00127 
00128                         if(MatValues)
00129                                 delete []MatValues;
00130                         MatValues = IMaterialSystem::copyAttributes(other.MatValues);
00131 
00132                         return *this;
00133                 }
00134

00244                 core::matrix4& getTextureMatrix(u32 i)
00245                 {
00246                         return TextureLayer[i].getTextureMatrix();
00247                 }
00248 
00250 
00252                 const core::matrix4& getTextureMatrix(u32 i) const
00253                 {
00254                         if (i<MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES)
00255                                 return TextureLayer[i].getTextureMatrix();
00256                         else
00257                                 return core::IdentityMatrix;
00258                 }
00259 
00261 
00263                 void setTextureMatrix(u32 i, const core::matrix4& mat)
00264                 {
00265                         if (i>=MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES)
00266                                 return;
00267                         TextureLayer[i].setTextureMatrix(mat);
00268                 }
00269 
00271 
00273                 ITexture* getTexture(u32 i) const
00274                 {
00275                         return i < MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES ? TextureLayer[i].Texture : 0;
00276                 }
00277 
00279 
00282                 void setTexture(u32 i, ITexture* tex)
00283                 {
00284                         if (i>=MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES)
00285                                 return;
00286                         TextureLayer[i].Texture = tex;
00287                 }

00290 
00292                 void setFlag(E_MATERIAL_FLAG flag, bool value)
00293                 {
00294                         switch (flag)
00295                         {
00296                                 case EMF_WIREFRAME:
00297                                         Wireframe = value; break;
00298                                 case EMF_POINTCLOUD:
00299                                         PointCloud = value; break;
00300                                 case EMF_GOURAUD_SHADING:
00301                                         GouraudShading = value; break;
00302                                 case EMF_LIGHTING:
00303                                         Lighting = value; break;
00304                                 case EMF_ZBUFFER:
00305                                         ZBuffer = value; break;
00306                                 case EMF_ZWRITE_ENABLE:
00307                                         ZWriteEnable = value; break;
00308                                 case EMF_BACK_FACE_CULLING:
00309                                         BackfaceCulling = value; break;
00310                                 case EMF_FRONT_FACE_CULLING:
00311                                         FrontfaceCulling = value; break;
00312                                 case EMF_BILINEAR_FILTER:
00313                                 {
00314                                         for (u32 i=0; i<MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES; ++i)
00315                                                 TextureLayer[i].BilinearFilter = value;
00316                                 }
00317                                 break;
00318                                 case EMF_TRILINEAR_FILTER:
00319                                 {
00320                                         for (u32 i=0; i<MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES; ++i)
00321                                                 TextureLayer[i].TrilinearFilter = value;
00322                                 }
00323                                 break;
00324                                 case EMF_ANISOTROPIC_FILTER:
00325                                 {
00326                                         for (u32 i=0; i<MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES; ++i)
00327                                                 TextureLayer[i].AnisotropicFilter = value;
00328                                 }
00329                                 break;
00330                                 case EMF_FOG_ENABLE:
00331                                         FogEnable = value; break;
00332                                 case EMF_NORMALIZE_NORMALS:
00333                                         NormalizeNormals = value; break;
00334                                 case EMF_TEXTURE_WRAP:
00335                                 {
00336                                         for (u32 i=0; i<MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES; ++i)
00337                                                 TextureLayer[i].TextureWrap = (E_TEXTURE_CLAMP)value;
00338                                 }
00339                                 break;
00340                                 default:
00341                                         break;
00342                         }
00343                 }
00344 
00346 
00348                 bool getFlag(E_MATERIAL_FLAG flag) const
00349                 {
00350                         switch (flag)
00351                         {
00352                                 case EMF_WIREFRAME:
00353                                         return Wireframe;
00354                                 case EMF_POINTCLOUD:
00355                                         return PointCloud;
00356                                 case EMF_GOURAUD_SHADING:
00357                                         return GouraudShading;
00358                                 case EMF_LIGHTING:
00359                                         return Lighting;
00360                                 case EMF_ZBUFFER:
00361                                         return ZBuffer!=0;
00362                                 case EMF_ZWRITE_ENABLE:
00363                                         return ZWriteEnable;
00364                                 case EMF_BACK_FACE_CULLING:
00365                                         return BackfaceCulling;
00366                                 case EMF_FRONT_FACE_CULLING:
00367                                         return FrontfaceCulling;
00368                                 case EMF_BILINEAR_FILTER:
00369                                         return TextureLayer[0].BilinearFilter;
00370                                 case EMF_TRILINEAR_FILTER:
00371                                         return TextureLayer[0].TrilinearFilter;
00372                                 case EMF_ANISOTROPIC_FILTER:
00373                                         return TextureLayer[0].AnisotropicFilter;
00374                                 case EMF_FOG_ENABLE:
00375                                         return FogEnable;
00376                                 case EMF_NORMALIZE_NORMALS:
00377                                         return NormalizeNormals;
00378                                 case EMF_TEXTURE_WRAP:
00379                                         return !(TextureLayer[0].TextureWrap ||
00380                                                         TextureLayer[1].TextureWrap ||
00381                                                         TextureLayer[2].TextureWrap ||
00382                                                         TextureLayer[3].TextureWrap);
00383                                 case EMF_MATERIAL_FLAG_COUNT:
00384                                         break;
00385                         }
00386 
00387                         return false;
00388                 }
00389 
00391 
00393                 inline bool operator!=(const SMaterial& b) const
00394                 {
00395                         bool different =
00396                                 MaterialType != b.MaterialType ||
00397                                 AmbientColor != b.AmbientColor ||
00398                                 DiffuseColor != b.DiffuseColor ||
00399                                 EmissiveColor != b.EmissiveColor ||
00400                                 SpecularColor != b.SpecularColor ||
00401                                 Shininess != b.Shininess ||
00402                                 MaterialTypeParam != b.MaterialTypeParam ||
00403                                 MaterialTypeParam2 != b.MaterialTypeParam2 ||
00404                                 Thickness != b.Thickness ||
00405                                 Wireframe != b.Wireframe ||
00406                                 PointCloud != b.PointCloud ||
00407                                 GouraudShading != b.GouraudShading ||
00408                                 Lighting != b.Lighting ||
00409                                 ZBuffer != b.ZBuffer ||
00410                                 ZWriteEnable != b.ZWriteEnable ||
00411                                 BackfaceCulling != b.BackfaceCulling ||
00412                                 FrontfaceCulling != b.FrontfaceCulling ||
00413                                 FogEnable != b.FogEnable ||
00414                                 NormalizeNormals != b.NormalizeNormals;
00415                         for (u32 i=0; (i<MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES) && !different; ++i)
00416                         {
00417                                 different |= (TextureLayer[i] != b.TextureLayer[i]);
00418                         }
00419                         return different;
00420                 }
00421 
00423 
00425                 inline bool operator==(const SMaterial& b) const
00426                 { return !(b!=*this); }
00427 
00428                 bool isTransparent() const
00429                 {
00430                         return MaterialType==EMT_TRANSPARENT_ADD_COLOR ||
00431                                 MaterialType==EMT_TRANSPARENT_ALPHA_CHANNEL ||
00432                                 MaterialType==EMT_TRANSPARENT_VERTEX_ALPHA ||
00433                                 MaterialType==EMT_TRANSPARENT_REFLECTION_2_LAYER;
00434                 }

00437 
00440                 void setValue(const c8 *name,f32 value)
00441                 {
00442                         if(!_stricmp(name,"Shininess"))
00443                                 Shininess = value;
00444                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"MaterialTypeParam"))
00445                                 MaterialTypeParam = value;
00446                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"MaterialTypeParam2"))
00447                                 MaterialTypeParam2 = value;
00448                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"Thickness"))
00449                                 Thickness = value;
00450                         else switch(IMaterialSystem::isBuiltinValue(name,io::EAT_FLOAT))
00451                         {
00452                                 case io::EAT_BOOL:
00453                                         setValue(name,(bool)(value != 0));
00454                                         break;
00455                                 case io::EAT_COLOR:
00456                                         setValue(name,SColorf(value,value,value));
00457                                         break;
00458                                 case io::EAT_INT:
00459                                         setValue(name,(s32)value);
00460                                         break;
00461                                 case io::EAT_UNKNOWN:
00462                                         createAttributes();
00463                                         MatValues->setAttribute(name,value);
00464                         }
00465                 }
00467 
00469                 f32 getFloatValue(const c8 *name) const
00470                 {
00471                         if(!_stricmp(name,"Shininess"))
00472                                 return Shininess;
00473                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"MaterialTypeParam"))
00474                                 return MaterialTypeParam;
00475                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"MaterialTypeParam2"))
00476                                 return MaterialTypeParam2;
00477                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"Thickness"))
00478                                 return Thickness;
00479                         else switch(IMaterialSystem::isBuiltinValue(name,io::EAT_FLOAT))
00480                         {
00481                                 case io::EAT_BOOL:
00482                                         return (f32)getBoolValue(name);
00483                                 case io::EAT_INT:
00484                                         return (f32)getIntValue(name);
00485                                         break;
00486                                 case io::EAT_UNKNOWN:
00487                                         if(MatValues)
00488                                                 return MatValues->getAttributeAsFloat(name);
00489                                 default:
00490                                         return 0.f;
00491                         }
00492                 }
00494 
00497                 void setValue(const c8 *name,bool value)
00498                 {
00499                         if(!_stricmp(name,"Wireframe"))
00500                                 Wireframe = value;
00501                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"PointCloud"))
00502                                 PointCloud = value;
00503                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"GouraudShading"))
00504                                 GouraudShading = value;
00505                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"Lighting"))
00506                                 Lighting = value;
00507                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"ZWriteEnable"))
00508                                 ZWriteEnable = value;
00509                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"BackfaceCulling"))
00510                                 BackfaceCulling = value;
00511                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"FrontfaceCulling"))
00512                                 FrontfaceCulling = value;
00513                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"BilinearFilter"))
00514                                 setFlag(EMF_BILINEAR_FILTER,value);
00515                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"TrilinearFilter"))
00516                                 setFlag(EMF_TRILINEAR_FILTER,value);
00517                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"AnisotropicFilter"))
00518                                 setFlag(EMF_ANISOTROPIC_FILTER,value);
00519                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"FogEnable"))
00520                                 FogEnable = value;
00521                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"Lighting"))
00522                                 Lighting = value;
00523                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"NormalizeNormals"))
00524                                 NormalizeNormals = value;
00525 
00526                         else switch(IMaterialSystem::isBuiltinValue(name,io::EAT_BOOL))
00527                         {
00528                                 case io::EAT_FLOAT:
00529                                         setValue(name,(f32)value);
00530                                         break;
00531                                 case io::EAT_COLOR:
00532                                         setValue(name,SColorf((f32)value,(f32)value,(f32)value));
00533                                         break;
00534                                 case io::EAT_INT:
00535                                         setValue(name,(int)value);
00536                                         break;
00537                                 case io::EAT_UNKNOWN:
00538                                         createAttributes();
00539                                         MatValues->setAttribute(name,value);
00540                         }
00541                 }
00542 
00544 
00546                 bool getBoolValue(const c8 *name) const
00547                 {
00548                         if(!_stricmp(name,"Wireframe"))
00549                                 return Wireframe;
00550                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"PointCloud"))
00551                                 return PointCloud;
00552                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"GouraudShading"))
00553                                 return GouraudShading;
00554                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"Lighting"))
00555                                 return Lighting;
00556                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"ZWriteEnable"))
00557                                 return ZWriteEnable;
00558                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"BackfaceCulling"))
00559                                 return BackfaceCulling;
00560                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"FrontfaceCulling"))
00561                                 return FrontfaceCulling;
00562                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"BilinearFilter"))
00563                                 return getFlag(EMF_BILINEAR_FILTER);
00564                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"TrilinearFilter"))
00565                                 return getFlag(EMF_TRILINEAR_FILTER);
00566                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"AnisotropicFilter"))
00567                                 return getFlag(EMF_ANISOTROPIC_FILTER);
00568                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"FogEnable"))
00569                                 return FogEnable;
00570                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"Lighting"))
00571                                 return Lighting;
00572                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"NormalizeNormals"))
00573                                 return NormalizeNormals;
00574 
00575                         else switch(IMaterialSystem::isBuiltinValue(name,io::EAT_BOOL))
00576                         {
00577                                 case io::EAT_FLOAT:
00578                                         return getFloatValue(name) != 0;
00579                                         break;
00580                                 case io::EAT_INT:
00581                                         return getIntValue(name) != 0;
00582                                         break;
00583                                 case io::EAT_UNKNOWN:
00584                                         if(MatValues)
00585                                                 MatValues->getAttributeAsBool(name);
00586                                 default:
00587                                         return false;
00588                         }
00589                 }

00594                 void setValue(const c8 *name,SColor &value)
00595                 {
00596                         if(!_stricmp(name,"AmbientColor"))
00597                                 AmbientColor = value;
00598                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"DiffuseColor"))
00599                                 DiffuseColor = value;
00600                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"EmissiveColor"))
00601                                 EmissiveColor = value;
00602                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"SpecularColor"))
00603                                 SpecularColor = value;
00604                         else switch(IMaterialSystem::isBuiltinValue(name,io::EAT_COLOR))
00605                         {
00606                                 case io::EAT_UNKNOWN:
00607                                         createAttributes();
00608                                         MatValues->setAttribute(name,value);
00609                         }
00610                 }
00612 
00614                 SColor getColorValue(const c8 *name) const
00615                 {
00616                         if(!_stricmp(name,"AmbientColor"))
00617                                 return AmbientColor;
00618                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"DiffuseColor"))
00619                                 return DiffuseColor;
00620                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"EmissiveColor"))
00621                                 return EmissiveColor;
00622                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"SpecularColor"))
00623                                 return SpecularColor;
00624                         else switch(IMaterialSystem::isBuiltinValue(name,io::EAT_COLOR))
00625                         {
00626                                 case io::EAT_UNKNOWN:
00627                                         if(MatValues)
00628                                                 return MatValues->getAttributeAsColor(name);
00629                                 default:
00630                                         return SColor();
00631                         }
00632                         
00633                 }
00635 
00638                 void setValue(const c8 *name,SColorf &value)
00639                 {
00640                         setValue(name,value.toSColor());
00641                 }
00643 
00646                 void setValue(const c8 *name,s32 value)
00647                 {
00648                         if(!_stricmp(name,"ZBuffer"))
00649                                 ZBuffer = core::clamp(value,0,2);
00650                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"TextureWrap"))
00651                         {       
00652                                 for (u32 i=0; i<MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES; ++i)
00653                                         TextureLayer[i].TextureWrap = (E_TEXTURE_CLAMP)core::clamp(value,(s32)ETC_REPEAT,(s32)ETC_MIRROR);      
00654                         }
00655                         else switch(IMaterialSystem::isBuiltinValue(name,io::EAT_INT))
00656                         {
00657                                 case io::EAT_BOOL:
00658                                         setValue(name,(bool)(value != 0));
00659                                         break;
00660                                 case io::EAT_COLOR:
00661                                         setValue(name,SColor(255,value,value,value));
00662                                         break;
00663                                 case io::EAT_INT:
00664                                         setValue(name,(f32)value);
00665                                         break;
00666                                 case io::EAT_UNKNOWN:
00667                                         createAttributes();
00668                                         MatValues->setAttribute(name,value);
00669                         }
00670                 }
00672 
00674                 s32 getIntValue(const c8 *name) const
00675                 {
00676                         if(!_stricmp(name,"ZBuffer"))
00677                                 return (int)ZBuffer;
00678                         else if(!_stricmp(name,"TextureWrap"))
00679                         {       
00680                                 s32 ret = TextureLayer[0].TextureWrap;
00681                                 for (u32 i=0; i<MATERIAL_MAX_TEXTURES; ++i)
00682                                 {
00683                                         if(ret != TextureLayer[i].TextureWrap)
00684                                                 return ETC_DIFFERENT;
00685                                 }
00686                                 return ret;
00687                         }
00688                         else switch(IMaterialSystem::isBuiltinValue(name,io::EAT_INT))
00689                         {
00690                                 case io::EAT_BOOL:
00691                                         return (s32)getBoolValue(name);
00692                                 case io::EAT_FLOAT:
00693                                         return (s32)getFloatValue(name);
00694                                 case io::EAT_UNKNOWN:
00695                                         if(MatValues)
00696                                                 return MatValues->getAttributeAsInt(name);
00697                                 default:
00698                                         return 0;
00699                         }
00700                 }

00707                 {
00708                         if(IMaterialSystem::isBuiltinValue(name) == io::EAT_UNKNOWN)
00709                         {
00710                                         createAttributes();
00711                                         MatValues->setAttribute(name,value);
00712                         }
00713                 }

00721                                 return MatValues->getAttributeAsVector3d(name);
00722                         }
00723                 }

00767                         }

00769                 
00770                 private:
00771                 
00772                 io::IAttributes *MatValues;
00773                 
00774                 inline void createAttributes()
00775                 {
00776                         if(!MatValues)
00777                                 MatValues = IMaterialSystem::createMaterialAttributes();
00778                 }

00780         };
